DC CODE § 47-4005

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor shall, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.
The rules shall include standards for:
The transfer of funds to the Fund; and
The reimbursement of costs incurred by the Mayor in the collection, processing, accounting, or disbursement of the funds generated by the tax check-off.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Drug Prevention and Children at Risk Tax Check-Off.
